message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $150. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $130. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm thinking more along the lines of $110.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $125. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm thinking more along the lines of $115.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than this point. I'm going to have to draw a line in the sand. I'm willing to meet you at $118, but no lower. It's the best I can do.
